concept.definition: the invoice has been prepared but not yet finalized.
the invoice has been finalized and sent to the recipient.
the invoice has been balaced / completely paid.
the invoice was determined as entered in error before it was issued.

description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of an Invoice.
name: InvoiceStatus

text.div:
InvoiceStatus

Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of an Invoice.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/invoice-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
draft draftthe invoice has been prepared but not yet finalized.
issued issuedthe invoice has been finalized and sent to the recipient.
balanced balancedthe invoice has been balaced / completely paid.
cancelled cancelledthe invoice was cancelled.
entered-in-error entered in errorthe invoice was determined as entered in error before it was issued.

title: InvoiceStatus
